text: Ambrose "Amblin' Amby" Schindler (April 22, 1917 - December 30, 2018) was an former American collegiate football player, coach, actor and stuntsman. He was born in San Diego, California. He played college football for the University of Southern California. He was in the 1940 Rose Bowl. He went on to be the MVP in the 1940 College All-Star Game, held at Soldier Field in Chicago.Jerry Crowe, Ambrose Schindler followed his own road to success at USC and beyond, Los Angeles Times, July 10, 2011, accessed July 12, 2011.Sport: Kickoff , Time, September 9, 1940, accessed July 12, 2011. Schindler was in the The Wizard of Oz as a Winkie Guard and as Jack Haley's Tin Man stunt double. He also appeared in Sailor's Lady (1940). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1917 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:American football quarterbacks Category:American football coaches Category:American movie actors Category:Stunt performers Category:Actors from San Diego Category:Sportspeople from San Diego
title: Ambrose Schindler
